name: com.unity.2d.tooling
description: A Unity Editor tool to analyze Sprite Atlases usage.

samples.description: Sample Sprite Atlas report that shows how to use the Sprite Atlas data source to create a report. Note that this sample uses the internal APIs from the package which are subject to change.

samples.displayName: Sample Sprite Data source And Report
samples.description: Sample custom data source and report implementation.
samples.path: Samples~/Sample Sprite Data source And Report
